price: 32. Y me ha ordenado ser respetuoso y amable con mi madre y no ser arrogante ni rebelde.
arabic: وَبَرَّۢا بِوَٰلِدَتِي وَلَمۡ يَجۡعَلۡنِي جَبَّارٗا شَقِيّٗا

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: wabarran biwālidatī walam yajʿalnī jabbāran shaqiyyan
